title: Check Prime

explanation.analogy: Try dividing by all possible factors. If none work, it's prime.

title: Binary to Decimal
Decimal to Binary

explanation.approach: Divide by 2, collect remainders, print reverse.
explanation.complexity: Time: O(log n), Space: O(log n)

title: Octal to Decimal
Hexadecimal to Decimal
LCM of Two Numbers

explanation.analogy: LCM is smallest number both divide into.

title: Armstrong Number

explanation.approach: Each digit raised to power of total digits, sum = n.

title: Fibonacci Iterative

explanation.approach: Keep two variables, update each iteration.
explanation.analogy: Like climbing stairs - remember last two steps.

title: Sum of Divisors

explanation.approach: Check each number 1 to n, add if divides evenly.

title: Count Divisors

explanation.approach: Count numbers that divide n evenly.

title: Print Primes to N

explanation.analogy: Filter out non-primes one by one.

title: Next Prime

explanation.analogy: Start after n, find first prime.
